Uses of Class
org.ensembl.datamodel.InvalidLocationException

Packages that use InvalidLocationException
org.ensembl.datamodel Data types that appear in the core ensembl databases such as Genes, Exons and Karyotypes and various support classes such as Location. 
 

Uses of InvalidLocationException in org.ensembl.datamodel
 

Methods in org.ensembl.datamodel that throw InvalidLocationException
 CloneFragmentLocation CloneFragmentLocation.append(CloneFragmentLocation location)
          Adds _location_ to the end of the location list, this is the same as using setNext(location) if next==null.
 Location Location.transform(int startDiff, int endDiff)
          Transforms this location into another by changing the start and end positions.
 Location Location.relative(int offset)
          Creates a new 1 base pair location relative to this location where newLocation.start = newLocation.end = this.start + offset.
 Location Location.relative(int offset, int length)
          Creates a new location relative to this location where start=this.start+offset, and end=this.start+length-1.
 AssemblyLocation AssemblyLocation.append(AssemblyLocation location)
          Deprecated. Adds _location_ to the end of the location list, this is the same as using setNext(location) if next==null.
